data.actual_result: The server guide is cut off on both sides
data.expected_result: The server guide should be fully visible and not cut off
data.short_description: "Welcome to your server" list gets cut off when member list is open and Discord is set to a small window size
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server so you can see the "Welcome to your server" list in the default channel and close the member list - Once you close the member list, unmaximise Discord and adjust the window size to the smallest window possible width-wise - Observe the "Welcome to your server" list with the member list closed and then open the member list and observe the list again
